m3_xml_validator Class Reference

This singleton class offers two different XML Schema validators, one for each XML document type used by the driver, and each can validate a document against it. More...

Detailed Description

This singleton class offers two different XML Schema validators, one for each XML document type used by the driver, and each can validate a document against it.

The shutdown method needs to be called after the last usage of this class.

Author:
Sivieri Alessandro
